item.title: Abandoned Hyde housing van, 14th December
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned van causing crime and parking issues, 14th December
item.description:
A white "Tidal Cleaning" service van broke down by the road several weeks ago. The owner has not returned to claim it. Since then it has taken panel and door damage as certain parties have tried to break in more than once. It is also causing residential parking issues.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sidcup Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gully still blocked, reported March 2024., 14th December
item.description:
Blocked Gully Reported via desktop in the Road Defect category anonymously at 18:48, Sun 10 March 2024 Sent to Bromley Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 5693005. As per map pin, road gully blocked, road defect category used as pin won't locate correctly. Water extends half way across northbound lane. Not dealt with, still an ongoing issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A208, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
